main.name: Dhruv Sharma
main.occupation: Final year B.Tech CSE from VIT Bhopal University
main.bio: AS A STUDENT ASPIRING TO BE A SOFTWARE ENGINEER, I AM A HIGHLY MOTIVATED AND DEDICATED INDIVIDUAL WITH A PASSION FOR TECHNOLOGY AND PROGRAMMING. I AM CURRENTLY PURSUING A DEGREE IN COMPUTER SCIENCE, AND HAVE GAINED A STRONG FOUNDATION IN PROGRAMMING LANGUAGE JAVA. I AM ALSO PROFICIENT IN WEB DEVELOPMENT USING TECHNOLOGIES SUCH AS HTML, CSS, AND JAVASCRIPT. I AM ALWAYS EAGER TO LEARN AND STAY CURRENT WITH THE LATEST TECHNOLOGIES AND INDUSTRY TRENDS.
